PSFC.text:
SPSFC
KPSF aps PRINTDEV
TPrint Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
E"Kenneth E. Tomiak"<CBT_Ken@KTomiak.BIZ>
Z20180221-145755
*
@IBM Corporation
*
Bapss9400.pdf: NS550-0427-00:
BPrint Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
BVersion 4, Release 1.0.
*
NPrint Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
N------------------------------------------------
NThis is a home for some additional JCL statements not documented with
Nthe rest of them in the JCL Reference manual.
* End of wish.

PSFC08.text:
SPSFC08
KPSF aps
TPrint Services Facility: Customization - PSF Parameters
E"Kenneth E. Tomiak"<CBT_Ken@KTomiak.BIZ>
Z20170427-183456
*
@IBM Corporation
NS550-0427-00 Print Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
NVersion 4, Release 1.0.
*
NThis chapter lists the PSF parameters you can specify in the Printer
NInventory and in the PRINTDEV statement of the PSF startup procedure.
I
INote: The Printer Inventory is used for deferred-printing mode; it is
Inot used for direct-printing mode.
I
NThis chapter also describes the parameters required for attaching and
Nsharing printers.
* End of wish.

PSFC0802.text:
SPSFC0802
KPSF aps
TPrint Services Facility: Customization - PRINTDEV statement
E"Kenneth E. Tomiak"<CBT_Ken@KTomiak.BIZ>
Z20170427-183456
*
@IBM Corporation
NS550-0427-00 Print Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
NVersion 4, Release 1.0.
*
NThe PRINTDEV statement specifies parameters for printer initialization.
NIn deferred-printing mode, PRINTDEV is among the JCL statements in the
NPSF startup procedure. In direct-printing mode, PRINTDEV is among the
NJCL statements associated with the application program.
* End of wish.

PSFC09.text:
SPSFC09
Kaps PSF PRINTDEV JCL SMF06
TPrint Services Facility: Customization -
TUsing Deferred-Printing Mode
E"Kenneth E. Tomiak"<CBT_Ken@KTomiak.BIZ>
Z20170427-183456
*
@IBM Corporation
NS550-0427-00 Print Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
NVersion 4, Release 1.0.
*
N
NPSF supports AFP printers as system output devices for deferred
Nprinting under the Job Entry Subsystem (JES). Some system printers
Nare managed by a JES output writer that operates entirely in the
NJES address space. PSF-attached printers, however, are defined as
Nfunctional subsystem applications (FSAs) that run under a separate
Naddress space called a PSF functional subsystem (FSS). A functional
Nsubsystem interface (FSI) maintains communication between the FSS
Nand the JES global address space.
* End of wish.

PSFC0902.text:
SPSFC0902
Kaps PSF SMF SMF06
TPrint Services Facility: Customization -
TPSF Startup Procedures for AFP Printers
E"Kenneth E. Tomiak"<CBT_Ken@KTomiak.BIZ>
Z20170427-183456
*
@IBM Corporation
NS550-0427-00 Print Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
NVersion 4, Release 1.0.
*
N
NBefore starting a PSF FSS, you must have a cataloged startup
Nprocedure in a system procedure library, such as SYS1.PROCLIB.
NThis procedure specifies PSF initialization parameters and
Nlibraries that contain system and installation resources. The
Nname of this procedure can be specified in the FSSDEF statement
Nof the JES initialization deck. If the name is omitted, JES3
Nsupplies a default, chosen for the defined printer.
N
D//SAMPPROC PROC
D//* THE FOLLOWING STARTUP PROCEDURE DEFINES THE JCL AND PRINTDEV
D//* STATEMENTS FOR THREE DIFFERENT PSF-SUPPORTED PRINTERS.
D//*
D//STEP01 EXEC PGM=APSPPIEP,REGION=4096K,TIME=1440,PARM=(,,,,TCPIP,UNICODE)
D//JOBHDR OUTPUT PAGEDEF=V06483, /* JOB HEADER PAGE */
D// FORMDEF=A10120,CHARS=60D8 /* FORMDEF: ALTERNATIVE BIN*/
D//JOBTLR OUTPUT PAGEDEF=V06483, /* JOB TRAILER PAGE */
D// FORMDEF=A10110,CHARS=60D8 /* FORMDEF: MAIN BIN */
D//DSHDR OUTPUT PAGEDEF=V06483, /* DATA SET SEPARATOR */
D// FORMDEF=A10110,CHARS=60D8 /* FORMDEF: MAIN BIN */
D//MSGDS OUTPUT PAGEDEF=A08682, /* MESSAGE DATA SET */
D// FORMDEF=A10110,CHARS=60D8 /* */ //*
D//PRTINFO DD DSN=SAMPPROC.PRTINFO,DISP=SHR */
D//*
D//FONT01 DD DSN=SYS1.FONTLIBB,DISP=SHR /* SYSTEM 240 PEL FONTS */
D// DD DSN=SYS1.FONTOLN,DISP=SHR /* SYSTEM OUTLINE FONTS */
D// DD DSN=INST.FONTLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION USER FONTS */
D//FONT02 DD DSN=SYS1.FONT300,DISP=SHR /* SYSTEM 300 PEL FONTS */
D// DD DSN=SYS1.FONTOLN,DISP=SHR /* SYSTEM OUTLINE FONTS */
D// DD DSN=INST.FONTLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION USER FONTS */
D//*
D//PSEG01 DD DSN=INST.R240.PSEGLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION PAGE SEGMENTS*/
D//* FORMATTED FOR 240 PEL
D//* PRINTERS
D// DD DSN=SPEC.PSEGLIB,DISP=SHR /* SPECIAL PAGE SEGMENTS */
D//*
D//PSEG02 DD DSN=INST.R300.PSEGLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION PAGE SEGMENTS*/
D//* FORMATTED FOR 300 PEL
D//* PRINTERS
D//*
D//OLAY01 DD DSN=INST.R240.OVERLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION OVERLAYS */
D//* FORMATTED FOR 240 PEL
D//* PRINTERS
D//*
D//OLAY02 DD DSN=INST.R300.OVERLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION OVERLAYS */
D//* FORMATTED FOR 300 PEL
D//* PRINTERS
D//*
D//PDEF01 DD DSN=SYS1.PDEFLIB,DISP=SHR /* SYSTEM PAGE DEFINITIONS */
D// DD DSN=INST.PDEFLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION PAGE DEFS */
D//* //FDEF01 DD DSN=SYS1.FDEFLIB,DISP=SHR /* SYSTEM FORM DEFINITIONS */
D// DD DSN=INST.FDEFLIB,DISP=SHR /* INSTALLATION FORM DEFS */
D//*
D//DOF1 DD PATH='/u/fonts/truetype/' /* DATA OBJECT FONT LIBRARY */
D// DD PATH='/u/fonts/myfonts/' */ //*
D//DOF2 DD PATH='/u/fonts/ttypefont/' /* DATA OBJECT FONT LIBRARY */
D//*
D//PRT1 CNTL
D//PRT1 PRINTDEV FONTDD=*.FONT01, /* DEFAULT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D// OVLYDD=*.OLAY01, /* DEFAULT OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D// PSEGDD=*.PSEG01, /* DEFAULT SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D// PDEFDD=*.PDEF01, /* PAGEDEF LIBRARY DD */
D// FDEFDD=*.FDEF01, /* FORMDEF LIBRARY DD */
D// FONTPATH=*.DOF1, /* DATA OBJECT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D// JOBHDR=*.JOBHDR, /* JOB HEADER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D// JOBTRLR=*.JOBTLR, /* JOB TRAILER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D// DSHDR=*.DSHDR, /* DATA SET HEADER SEPARATOR */
D// MESSAGE=*.MSGDS, /* MESSAGE DATA SET OUTPUT */
D// BUFNO=1, /* NUMBER OF WRITE DATA BUFFERS */
D// PAGEDEF=A08682, /* DEVICE PAGEDEF DEFAULT */
D// FORMDEF=A10110, /* DEVICE FORMDEF DEFAULT */
D// CHARS=60D8, /* DEVICE DEFAULT FONT */
D// PIMSG=(YES,16), /* ACCUMULATE DATA SET MESSAGES */
D// DATACK=UNBLOCK, /* UNBLOCK DATA CHECKS */
D// TRACE=YES, /* BUILD INTERNAL TRACE */
D// SETUP=FORMS /* SETUP MESSAGE */
D//PRT1 ENDCNTL //*
D//PRT2 CNTL
D//PRT2 PRINTDEV FONTDD=*.FONT01, /* DEFAULT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D// OVLYDD=*.OLAY01, /* DEFAULT OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D// PSEGDD=*.PSEG02, /* DEFAULT SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D// PDEFDD=*.PDEF01, /* PAGEDEF LIBRARY DD */
D// FDEFDD=*.FDEF01, /* FORMDEF LIBRARY DD */
D// JOBHDR=*.JOBHDR, /* JOB HEADER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D// JOBTRLR=*.JOBTLR, /* JOB TRAILER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D// MESSAGE=*.MSGDS, /* MESSAGE DATA SET OUTPUT */
D// PAGEDEF=A08682, /* DEVICE PAGEDEF DEFAULT */
D// FORMDEF=A10110, /* DEVICE FORMDEF DEFAULT */
D// CHARS=60D8, /* DEVICE DEFAULT FONT */
D// PIMSG=(YES,16), /* ACCUMULATE DATA SET MESSAGES */
D// DATACK=BLOCK, /* BLOCK DATA CHECKS */
D// TRACE=YES, /* BUILD INTERNAL TRACE */
D// FAILURE=WCONNECT, /* VTAM: ATTEMPT RECONNECT */
D// DISCINTV=0, /* VTAM: NO TIME OUT */
D// MGMTMODE=IMMED, /* VTAM: MAINTAIN SESSION */
D// APPLID=PRT2APPL, /* VTAM: APPLICATION PGM NODE */
D// LUNAME=PRT2LU /* VTAM: LOGICAL UNIT NODE */
D//PRT2 ENDCNTL
D//*
D//PRT3 CNTL
D//PRT3 PRINTDEV FONTDD=*.FONT01, /* FONT LIBRARY DD */
D// FONT240=*.FONT01, /* 240 PEL FONT LIBRARY DD */
D// FONT300=*.FONT02, /* 300 PEL FONT LIBRARY DD */
D// OVLYDD=*.OLAY01, /* OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D// OVLY240=*.OLAY01, /* 240 PEL OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D// OVLY300=*.OLAY02, /* 300 PEL OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D// PSEGDD=*.PSEG01, /* SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D// PSEG240=*.PSEG01, /* 240 PEL SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D// PSEG300=*.PSEG02, /* 300 PEL SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D// PDEFDD=*.PDEF01, /* PAGEDEF LIBRARY DD */
D// FDEFDD=*.FDEF01, /* FORMDEF LIBRARY DD */
D// FONTPATH=*.DOF2, /* DATA OBJECT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D// JOBHDR=*.JOBHDR, /* JOB HEADER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D// JOBTRLR=*.JOBTLR, /* JOB TRAILER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D// MESSAGE=*.MSGDS, /* MESSAGE DATA SET OUTPUT */
D// PAGEDEF=A08682, /* DEVICE PAGEDEF DEFAULT */
D// FORMDEF=A10110, /* DEVICE FORMDEF DEFAULT */
D// CHARS=60D8, /* DEVICE DEFAULT FONT */
D// PIMSG=(YES,16), /* ACCUMULATE DATA SET MESSAGES */
D// DATACK=BLOCK, /* BLOCK DATA CHECKS */
D// TRACE=YES, /* BUILD INTERNAL TRACE */
D// FAILURE=WCONNECT, /* ATTEMPT RECONNECT */
D// DISCINTV=0, /* NO TIME OUT */ // MGMTMODE=IMMED, /* MAINTAIN SESSION */
D// IPADDR='9.99.12.33' /* IP ADDRESS OF PRINTER */
D//PRT3 ENDCNTL
I
IJCL for PSF Startup Procedures
I
Nnnnnnnnn PROC Specifies the name of the startup procedure. The procedure name m
N
NDD Identifies the system libraries that contain resources (fonts, page segments
N
NPRINTDEV Specifies printer-initialization parameters. A PRINTDEV statement is e
N
NNSTddname Specifies the name of a DD statement defining the output data set in
N
NNote: When the number of pages specified is more than 32, and the specified reg
* End of wish.

PSFC0909.text:
SPSFC0909
Kaps PSF SMF SMF06
TPrint Services Facility: Customization
T-PSF Startup Procedures for AFP Printers
E"Kenneth E. Tomiak"<CBT_Ken@KTomiak.BIZ>
Z20170506-202010
*
@IBM Corporation
NS550-0427-00 Print Services Facility for z/OS - Customization
NVersion 4, Release 1.0.
*
N
NBefore starting a PSF FSS, you must have a cataloged startup
Nprocedure in a system procedure library, such as SYS1.PROCLIB.
N
NThis procedure specifies PSF initialization parameters and
Nlibraries that contain system and installation resources. The
Nname of this procedure can be specified in the FSSDEF statement
Nof the JES initialization deck. If the name is omitted, JES3
Nsupplies a default, chosen for the defined printer.
M
MThe example shown below came out of the IBM manual and was then
Mreformatted to conform with the 'Programming Using The Kenneth
MTomiak Method' (PUTKTM).
M
D//PSFPROC PROC ,                 /* IBM Example procedure (Modified) */
D//*     THE FOLLOWING STARTUP PROCEDURE DEFINES THE JCL AND PRINTDEV
D//*     STATEMENTS FOR THREE DIFFERENT PSF-SUPPORTED PRINTERS.       */
D//*
D//ST01#01 EXEC PGM=APSPPIEP,PARM=(,,,,TCPIP,UNICODE),
D//             REGION=4096K,TIME=1440
D//DSHDR OUTPUT CHARS=60D8,                     /* DATA SET SEPARATOR */
D//             FORMDEF=A10110,                  /* FORMDEF: MAIN BIN */
D//             PAGEDEF=V06483
D//JOBHD OUTPUT CHARS=60D8,                        /* JOB HEADER PAGE */
D//             FORMDEF=A10120,              /* FORMDEF: ALTERNATE BIN*/
D//             PAGEDEF=V06483
D//JOBTL OUTPUT CHARS=60D8,                       /* JOB TRAILER PAGE */
D//             FORMDEF=A10110,                  /* FORMDEF: MAIN BIN */
D//             PAGEDEF=V06483
D//MSGDS OUTPUT CHARS=60D8,                       /* MESSAGE DATA SET */
D//             FORMDEF=A10110,                         /* NO COMMENT */
D//             PAGEDEF=A08682
D//*
D//DOF1      DD PATH='/u/fonts/truetype/' /* DATA OBJECT FONT LIBRARY */
D//          DD PATH='/u/fonts/myfonts/'                /* NO COMMENT */
D//DOF2      DD PATH='/u/fonts/ttypefont/'       /* DATA OBJECT FONTS */
D//FDEF01    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYS1.FDEFLIB  /* SYSTEM FORM DEFINITIONS */
D//          DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.FDEFLIB   /* INSTALLATION FORM DEFS */
D//FONT01    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYS1.FONTLIBB    /* SYSTEM 240 PEL FONTS */
D//          DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYS1.FONTOLN     /* SYSTEM OUTLINE FONTS */
D//          DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.FONTLIB  /* INSTALLATION USER FONTS */
D//FONT02    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYS1.FONT300     /* SYSTEM 300 PEL FONTS */
D//          DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYS1.FONTOLN     /* SYSTEM OUTLINE FONTS */
D//          DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.FONTLIB  /* INSTALLATION USER FONTS */
D//OLAY01    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.R240.OVERLIB /* INSTALLATION
D//*                                              OVERLAYS FORMATTED
D//*                                              FOR 240 PEL
D//*                                              PRINTERS            */
D//OLAY02    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.R300.OVERLIB /* INSTALLATION OVERLAYS
D//*                                              FORMATTED FOR 300 PEL
D//*                                              PRINTERS            */
D//PDEF01    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SYS1.PDEFLIB  /* SYSTEM PAGE DEFINITIONS */
D//          DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.PDEFLIB   /* INSTALLATION PAGE DEFS */
D//PRTINFO   DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SAMPPROC.PRTINFO           /* NO COMMENT */
D//PSEG01    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.R240.PSEGLIB /* INSTALLATION PAGE
D//*                                              SEGMENTS FORMATTED
D//*                                              FOR 240 PEL
D//*                                              PRINTERS            */
D//          DD DISP=SHR,DSN=SPEC.PSEGLIB    /* SPECIAL PAGE SEGMENTS */
D//PSEG02    DD DISP=SHR,DSN=INST.R300.PSEGLIB /* INSTALLATION PAGE
D//*                                              SEGMENTS FORMATTED
D//*                                              FOR 300 PEL
D//*                                              PRINTERS            */
D//*
D//PR1     CNTL
D//PR1 PRINTDEV BUFNO=1,              /* NUMBER OF WRITE DATA BUFFERS */
D//             CHARS=60D8,                    /* DEVICE DEFAULT FONT */
D//             DATACK=UNBLOCK,                /* UNBLOCK DATA CHECKS */
D//             DSHDR=*.DSHDR,           /* DATA SET HEADER SEPARATOR */
D//             FDEFDD=*.FDEF01,                /* FORMDEF LIBRARY DD */
D//             FONTDD=*.FONT01,           /* DEFAULT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D//             FONTPATH=*.DOF1,       /* DATA OBJECT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D//             FORMDEF=A10110,             /* DEVICE FORMDEF DEFAULT */
D//             JOBHRD=*.JOBHD,        /* JOB HEADER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D//             JOBTRLR=*.JOBTL,      /* JOB TRAILER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D//             MESSAGE=*.MSGDS,           /* MESSAGE DATA SET OUTPUT */
D//             OVLYDD=*.OLAY01,        /* DEFAULT OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D//             PAGEDEF=A08682,             /* DEVICE PAGEDEF DEFAULT */
D//             PDEFDD=*.PDEF01,                /* PAGEDEF LIBRARY DD */
D//             PIMSG=(YES,16),       /* ACCUMULATE DATA SET MESSAGES */
D//             PSEGDD=*.PSEG01,        /* DEFAULT SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D//             SETUP=FORMS,                         /* SETUP MESSAGE */
D//             TRACE=YES                     /* BUILD INTERNAL TRACE */
D//PR1  ENDCNTL
D//*
D//PR2     CNTL
D//PR2 PRINTDEV APPLID=PRT2APPL,        /* VTAM: APPLICATION PGM NODE */
D//             CHARS=60D8,                    /* DEVICE DEFAULT FONT */
D//             DATACK=BLOCK,                    /* BLOCK DATA CHECKS */
D//             DISCINTV=0,                      /* VTAM: NO TIME OUT */
D//             FAILURE=WCONNECT,          /* VTAM: ATTEMPT RECONNECT */
D//             FDEFDD=*.FDEF01,                /* FORMDEF LIBRARY DD */
D//             FONTDD=*.FONT01,           /* DEFAULT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D//             FORMDEF=A10110,             /* DEVICE FORMDEF DEFAULT */
D//             JOBHRD=*.JOBHD,        /* JOB HEADER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D//             JOBTRLR=*.JOBTL,      /* JOB TRAILER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D//             LUNAME=PRT2LU,             /* VTAM: LOGICAL UNIT NODE */
D//             MESSAGE=*.MSGDS,           /* MESSAGE DATA SET OUTPUT */
D//             MGMTMODE=IMMED,             /* VTAM: MAINTAIN SESSION */
D//             PAGEDEF=A08682,             /* DEVICE PAGEDEF DEFAULT */
D//             PIMSG=(YES,16),       /* ACCUMULATE DATA SET MESSAGES */
D//             OVLYDD=*.OLAY01,        /* DEFAULT OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D//             PDEFDD=*.PDEF01,                /* PAGEDEF LIBRARY DD */
D//             PSEGDD=*.PSEG02,        /* DEFAULT SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D//             TRACE=YES                     /* BUILD INTERNAL TRACE */
D//PR2  ENDCNTL
D//*
D//PR3     CNTL
D//PR3 PRINTDEV CHARS=60D8,                    /* DEVICE DEFAULT FONT */
D//             DATACK=BLOCK,                    /* BLOCK DATA CHECKS */
D//             DISCINTV=0,                            /* NO TIME OUT */
D//             FAILURE=WCONNECT,                /* ATTEMPT RECONNECT */
D//             FDEFDD=*.FDEF01,                /* FORMDEF LIBRARY DD */
D//             FONTDD=*.FONT01,                   /* FONT LIBRARY DD */
D//             FONT240=*.FONT01,          /* 240 PEL FONT LIBRARY DD */
D//             FONT300=*.FONT02,          /* 300 PEL FONT LIBRARY DD */
D//             FONTPATH=*.DOF2,       /* DATA OBJECT FONT LIBRARY DD */
D//             FORMDEF=A10110,             /* DEVICE FORMDEF DEFAULT */
D//             IPADDR='9.99.12.33',         /* IP ADDRESS OF PRINTER */
D//             JOBHRD=*.JOBHD,        /* JOB HEADER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D//             JOBTRLR=*.JOBTL,      /* JOB TRAILER SEPARATOR OUTPUT */
D//             MESSAGE=*.MSGDS,           /* MESSAGE DATA SET OUTPUT */
D//             PAGEDEF=A08682,             /* DEVICE PAGEDEF DEFAULT */
D//             OVLYDD=*.OLAY01,                /* OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D//             OVLY240=*.OLAY01,       /* 240 PEL OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D//             OVLY300=*.OLAY02,       /* 300 PEL OVERLAY LIBRARY DD */
D//             PSEGDD=*.PSEG01,                /* SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D//             PSEG240=*.PSEG01,       /* 240 PEL SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D//             PSEG300=*.PSEG02,       /* 300 PEL SEGMENT LIBRARY DD */
D//             PDEFDD=*.PDEF01,                /* PAGEDEF LIBRARY DD */
D//             PIMSG=(YES,16),       /* ACCUMULATE DATA SET MESSAGES */
D//             MGMTMODE=IMMED,                   /* MAINTAIN SESSION */
D//             TRACE=YES                     /* BUILD INTERNAL TRACE */
D//PR3  ENDCNTL
* End of wish.
